meanings.definition: Having knowledge of various subjects or fields.
meanings.sent1: She is a polymathic student, excelling in math, science, and history.
meanings.sent2: The professor's polymathic expertise allowed him to teach a wide range of topics.
meanings.sent3: The polymathic cat seemed to know everything about every corner of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her polymathic mind was like a library filled with books on every subject imaginable.
meanings.sent5: His polymathic abilities made him the go-to person for any question.

meanings.definition: A person who has knowledge of many different subjects.
meanings.sent1: As a polymathic, she could discuss art, literature, and politics with ease.
meanings.sent2: The polymathic was sought after for advice on a wide range of topics.
meanings.sent3: The polymathic at the party was the center of attention, answering questions left and right.
meanings.sent4: In the world of knowledge, the polymathic is like a star shining brightly among others.
meanings.sent5: The polymathic's mind was a treasure trove of information waiting to be explored.
